programme.title: CYC TV
programme.desc: Christian Youth Channel - CYC aka Coptic Youth Channel, is a television and internet based English Coptic Orthodox Channel. CYC is the first English Coptic Christian channel, dedicated to Christians all around the world to spread the teachings and love of Jesus Christ. CYC looks to spread the word and life of Christ all through the world in a way that is compatible with today’s media consumption methods.

programme.title: CTV
programme.desc: CTV is the official channel of the Coptic Orthodox Church, run under the care and blessings of our Supreme Pontiff, His Holiness Pope Shenouda III, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the See of St. Mark, may the Lord prolong his life for many years and healthy, safe eras.The channel presents all manner of art and television programs which reflect the original proper Orthodox faith and the Church's message, founded on love and peace within a framework of professional international media, which occasioned its enormous success. قناة سي تي في هي القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية، تحت رعاية قداسة البابا المعظم الأنبا تواضروس الثاني، بابا الإسكندرية وبطريرك الكرازة المرقسية، أدام الله رئاسته لنا سنينًا عديدة وأزمنة سلامية هادئة مديدة. وتقوم القناة بتقديم كافة أنواع الفنون والبرامج التليفزيونية التي تعكس أصالة وجوهر وسلامة العقيدة الأرثوذكسية ورسالة الكنيسة القائمة على المحبة والسلام في إطار من الحرفية الإعلامية.

programme.title: MESat TV
programme.desc: ME Sat TV, is a Christian Orthodox channel; aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة مى سات، القناة الرسمية للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية تنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Aghapy TV
programme.desc: Aghapy TV, the very first Coptic Orthodox Christian satellite channel, aims to serve Christians worldwide through the broadcast of spiritual, social and health-related programmes. قناة أغابي هي أول قناة أورثوذكسية قبطية تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات من كنائس مختلفة وأحيانًا تبث قداسات باللغة الإنجليزية من كنائس قبطية بالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية وكندا.

programme.title: Logos TV
programme.desc: Logos TV is a Christian Orthodox channel; its message is testimony to our good Lord Jesus Christ according to our Orthodox faith. The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

The channels efforts revolve around four axes: Evangelism, education, healing, and defending the oppressed and persecuted. قناة لوجوس قـــناة الكنيسة القــبطية الأرثـــوذكسية الأولـــى بالمهجـــر، تحت الإشراف المباشر للكنيسة القبطية الأرثوذكسية... قناة لوجوس هي قناة مسيحية أرثوذكسية رسالتها الشهادة لإلهنا الصالح الرب يسوع المسيح حسب الإيمان الأرثوذكسي..

programme.title: El Maqar TV
programme.desc: El Maqar TV - A Coptic TV Channel under the see of H.H. Pope Tawadros II and his partner in the service H.G. Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

Bishop David Live Broadcast from NJ USA. شبكه قنوات المقر البابوي هي مجموعه قنوات خاصه وتابعه للمقر البابوي بنيوجيرسى تتنوع برامج القناة بين تعليم الألحان القبطية، ودراسة الكتاب المقدس، عرض مسرحيات وأفلام دينية وبث مباشر للقداسات.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.title: Free-TV
programme.desc: Free TV is the Number One Music channel in Lebanon. In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة فري تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

In addition to airing the largest number of latest hits and exclusive music videos, Free TV also produces different entertainment shows all of which are directly related to music and celebrities. قناة ارابيكا تي-في هي الوجهة الأولى للموسيقى في لبنان، وبالإضافة إلى بث أكبر عدد من أنجح الأغاني الحديثة، تقوم القناة بإنتاج العديد من البرامج الترفيهية المرتبطة مباشرة بالموسيقى ومشاهير عالم الفن.

programme.title: Arabica-TV
programme.desc: A distinctively emotional round of mood-enhancing songs. حناجر ذهبية تؤدي أجمل الأغنيات التي تناسب كل الأذواق والأمزجة.

programme.title: Arabica-TV
programme.desc: Arabic hits that simply strike the right note for a fulfilling musical experience. أشهر الأغاني العربية المصورة التي تناسب جميع الأذواق وتلعب على أوتار القلب فتارة يذوب حناناً ورقة، وطوراً تتسارع دقاته مع الإيقاع فيفيض حيوية وبهجة.

programme.desc: The doctors are honored for their contributions to the community. Before the event, the clinic has animals in need of care, including a goat with a badly twisted leg, a Great Dane with a life-threatening condition and a bulldog rescued from a puppy mill.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue takes a trip to a vegan cattle ranch to castrate five 1200-pound adult bulls. Tension runs high when a scary bulldozing occurs. Dr. Ross treats a hen with rough-mating injury. A young puppy needs a serious surgery after being hit by a car.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue must figure out what's wrong with Niko, a lethargic dog that may have eaten his mom's shorts. Dr. Lavigne operates on a husky with a torn ligament and Dr. Ross faces an emergency with his own family pet. The vets treat Cy-Fair to a crawfish boil.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr. Blue takes on an urgent case after a pit bull suffers a raccoon attack. Dr. Ross takes on an aggressive ferret, and the vets test out their pig whispering skills at an animal rescue. The doctors have a surprise announcement for their wives.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Bubby Cook, a beloved Basset Hound, has a condition that could complicate surgery for Dr. Ross. Dr. Blue has a hog house call, and Dr. Lavigne has concerns over his vet tech assisting with an operation on her own dog. A blackout creates chaos at Cy-Fair.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Police rescue a turtle caught on fishing line and it's up to Dr. Ross to unhook him. Dr. Blue must wait for test results after performing dental surgery on a loveable dachshund, while Dr. Lavigne gives a stray cat first class treatment.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The wardens are deep into deer season, investigating a suspected poacher and a felon who shouldn't be using a firearm to hunt. An alligator and her hatchlings must be captured and relocated from a school.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens relocate a large herd of pronghorn to restore populations in West Texas, investigate the killing of a protected rattlesnake, and wrangle a loose bull. Game Wardens check hunting camps to ensure no one's taking too many white-tail deer.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens see plenty of violations at night, from road hunters to felons possessing firearms. Game Wardens stop wildlife crimes with anonymous tips about anglers keeping over the limit and a specially trained k-9 unit to sniff out illegal items.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens search for an endangered Whooping Crane. A local beauty shop owner finds an injured baby hawk. Wardens respond to a call about a nuisance alligator and suspicions of a deer poacher arise.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: Officer McKee handles a pesky bear in a school yard and on Mt. Washington a team searches for lost hikers. During a routine investigation, Canfield finds more than he bargained for, and an abandoned car is suspected to be linked to a missing persons case.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Egan sets up a decoy and checks hunters at a popular bird hunting site. Officers Towne and Bronson help rescue an injured hiker on Mount Kearsarge. Plus, Lt. Boudreau and Officer MacFadzen investigate a hunting on private property call.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Officer Hannett patrols for ice fishermen while Lt. Boudreau investigates a hunter who shot towards a road. Officer Holmes deals with a raccoon hiding in a warm chimney. And later, Officer St. Pierre goes on his first dive recovery under the ice.

programme.title: North Woods Law: Uncuffed
programme.desc: The conservation officers of New Hampshire are constantly on the watch for hunters illegally baiting wildlife and run into two separate cases of people taking illegal actions during deer and bear season.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The start of the busy tourist season has the wardens out in full force. A dangerous fox is on the loose in a crowded campground-the wardens need to find it fast. An ATV rider appears to have been partying too hard and nearly causes a wipe out.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: An ATV trail becomes the site of a high-speed chase when a man with an outstanding warrant attempts to flee from the Maine Warden Service. With the weather warming up, the wardens deal with intentional violators and serial offenders while enforcing laws.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The game wardens are on the lookout for over eager sportsmen trying to bend the rules as the season comes to close. One warden catches a Canadian posing as an American while others bring a fugitive to justice.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As sportsmen arrive to take part in Maine's big game season, the wardens keep a watchful eye for night hunters and track down a deer poacher. Then, some hunters from out of state get a lesson in Maine's hunting laws.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Equipped with a 205 ft zipline entrance through the trees, Pete and his team work modern magic in Georgia.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete creates an arboreal abode for an adventurous Alaskan couple that offers all the warm fuzzies they get from the outdoors without having to brave the bitter mountain cold.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete makes a treehouse touchdown in Pittsburgh for Antonio Brown, wide receiver for the Steelers. The game plan is to build a luxury skybox with a two-storey window wall that overlooks a custom basketball court and football field.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Dreams are coming to life in Oregon as Pete builds for an exceptional client named Marlene, who at 81-years-young is finally getting one of her greatest wishes fulfilled: a treehouse. Marlene's giddy with excitement for this new adventure.

programme.title: Animal Cribs
programme.desc: Antonio meets a couple whose home has been taken over by their rescued bunnies. He'll transform their overgrown backyard into a beach-themed oasis for humans and bunnies, complete with predator-proof enclosures.

programme.title: Animal Cribs

programme.title: Animal Cribs

programme.desc: At the 1996 Olympics, a security guard discovers pipe bombs and clears the area to minimize fatalities. Praised as a hero, the FBI then decides he fits the profile of a domestic terrorist, while the real villain continues his terror campaign.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: A Washington community is shocked when PTA mom, Mechele Linehan is arrested for murder from a decade earlier in Alaska. Details of a seedy and sordid past emerge. But is this suburban mother a cold-blooded temptress or has she been wrongly accused.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: A backyard shed in a Michigan trailer park holds the answers to a dark secret regarding a missing teenage couple. Police interview their families, but one member is evasive, deepening the mystery and setting off a covert manhunt across the Midwest.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: When a widower and father of three is found dead outside his Long Island home, police have reason to believe shady business dealings may have caused his murder. But then a tip leads to three unlikely suspects, exposing dark family secrets.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Agnes Bram, an 82-year-old Middleton, Wisconsin woman is found murdered in her garage. As detectives develop their case, a city-wide manhunt follows, and investigators are forced to curb public hysteria with the need to ensure he doesn't kill again.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: A convenience store clerk working the graveyard shift is on edge after a string of grisly murders are committed within blocks of her store. Soon, her worst nightmare becomes reality when she comes face to face with a twisted and deranged serial killer.

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Two young mothers living hundreds of miles apart vanish under eerily similar circumstances. Years pass without a single lead in either case until a Missouri police officer's routine house call uncovers the most unlikely suspect.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: In the heart of Richmond, VA, a love triangle tears apart a group of gay girlfriends- and leads to brutal murder. Investigating this senseless and sadistic killing, detectives uncover a deadly plot fueled by lies, gossip, and a thirst for revenge.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: When a small-town girl is stabbed to death while housesitting, detectives must work to separate twisted fantasies from dead serious fact, in a case that blurs the line between movie horror and real-life murder.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: When firefighters extinguish a California brush fire, they unexpectedly ignite a twisted murder mystery- rife with forced prostitution, burning jealousy, and an almost unthinkable murder mastermind.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: Heather, a grocery store barista, has just began dating her most recent hire, Arturo. But as time goes by, Arturo is unable to hide his dark side. His obsession with Heather comes at the expense of their relationship, his job - and her life.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: In the spring of 2003, 37 year old single mother Karen Richardt has a chance meeting with her Brooklyn neighbor Carlito Perez. But when Karen tries to distance herself, no one could have predicted the deadly cycle of violence he would unleash.

programme.title: Obsession: Dark Desires
programme.desc: When US postal worker Kim accepts a ride to the Orange County fair from a quiet co-worker, she has no idea that she will become the center of a terrifying campaign of stalking, harassment, and obsession.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: When 18-year-old freshman Katherine Foster goes missing, terror strikes the heart of the University of South Alabama. Has she been abducted? Raped? Is there a killer in their midst? Rumors fly, as students fear the worst ... anyone could be next.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: 39-year-old, Michael Zammitti, Jr., has it all: a loving family, a thriving business, and a comfortable home. But when that life is shattered, police must untangle a web of corruption and lies that will rock two small New England towns to their core.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: A mysterious call draws the Sheriff's Office in Orlando, Florida to a young artist's second floor apartment, where she's found brutally beaten. With few clues to investigate, can detectives uncover this shadow in the night before he strikes again.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When Alicia DeBolt goes missing, a helpful neighbor points the finger at an older kid she's been hanging out with. When police discover a string of texts on her cell phone, the net closes in on a sadistic killer whose obsession leads to tragedy.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: After a teenage house party spirals out of control, a shocking photo goes viral around the local schools. A vicious campaign of cyber bullying ensues that drives an innocent girl to take desperate action.

programme.title: Web of Lies

programme.title: Web of Lies

programme.desc: Five US Navy planes vanish without a trace in the Bermuda Triangle, fueling speculation that this strange stretch of water is cursed. Using the latest science and tech, a team of experts investigate why the planes disappeared and where they are today.

programme.title: Curse of the Bermuda Triangle
programme.desc: When a credible witness claims to have discovered the wreckage of a long-lost ship, experts launch an investigation to positively identify the missing vessel and uncover how it could be more than 10 miles from where it reportedly sank.

programme.title: Ghosts of the Deep: Black Sea Shipwrecks
programme.desc: The largest ocean archaeological expedition ever has discovered a fleet of ancient ships perfectly preserved in the Black Sea’s mysterious depths, and as experts investigate this holy grail of shipwrecks, they uncover hidden secrets and lost treasures.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: New evidence in the Bermuda Triangle could reveal the Nazis got closer to America than ever believed, and using the latest cutting-edge technology, experts investigate the truth behind the shipwreck that shouldn't exist.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: The disappearance of the SS Cotopaxi helped launch the legend of the Bermuda Triangle. Today, a team of experts follow fresh leads with cutting-edge tech to investigate if a mysterious wreck off the coast of Florida is indeed the long-lost ship.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: A cutting-edge investigation into a deep-sea graveyard of twenty-five shipwrecks reveals the dark secrets of the biggest naval battle in history. Using the latest tech, experts follow new evidence into the mysterious abyss of long-lost battleships.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: A mysterious shipwreck at the bottom of Lake Erie could be the oldest wreck in America's most notorious ship graveyard, and using cutting-edge underwater archaeological methods, experts investigate new leads in this 200-year-old cold case.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: Discoveries reveal the treasures of a ghost fleet of Japanese ships at the bottom of the South Pacific, and using cutting-edge underwater technology, experts are investigating a top-secret superweapon that could have changed the course of World War II.

programme.title: Shipwreck Secrets
programme.desc: When a sister ship of the Titanic gets embroiled in war with a hidden enemy, the former luxury liner is sent to the bottom of the ocean; new discoveries and cutting-edge underwater technology might finally reveal the secret history of its sinking.

programme.title: Bermuda Triangle: The New Secrets
programme.desc: Using cutting-edge technology, experts investigate the truth behind the Bermuda triangle.

programme.title: Strange Evidence

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: A massive plume of smoke suddenly erupts from the ground in Manhattan, and experts investigate if this terrifying event is evidence of a volcano waking up beneath the streets of New York City and if it's almost due to blow.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
programme.desc: When a strange, dried-out creature washes ashore downriver from a nuclear power plant, some experts suspect it's the mummified corpse of a mutant; using the latest science and tech, this incredible theory is put to the test.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
